Misc module¶

Available classes:

  • KrigingComparison: Class compares different areal kriging models and techniques.

KrigingComparison¶

Class initialization¶

pyinterpolate.misc.compare.KrigingComparison(theoretical_semivariogram,
                                             areas, points,
                                             search_radius, ranges_of_observations,
                                             training_set_frac=0.8, iters=20)

Class compares different areal kriging models and techniques.

INITIALIZATION PARAMS:

  • theoretical_semivariogram: (TheoreticalSemivariogram) modeled semivariogram,

  • areas: (numpy array) areas in the form:

[area_id, polygon, centroid x, centroid y, value]

  • points: (numpy array) points within areas in the form:

[
    area_id,
    [point_position_x, point_position_y, value]
]

  • search_radius: (float) minimal search radius to looking for neighbors,

  • ranges_of_observations: (int) how many neighbors include in analysis,

  • training_set_frac: (float in range 0-1) how many values set as a “known points”,

  • iters: (int) number test (more tests == more accurate Root Mean Squared Error of comparisons).

Class public methods:¶

  • run_tests: Method compares area-to-area, area-to-point and centroid based area Poisson Kriging.

KrigingComparison.run_tests¶

KrigingComparison.run_tests(self)

Method compares area-to-area, area-to-point and centroid based area Poisson Kriging.
